title: Love is Blind Pod Squad Golden Goblet Necklace
body_html:
From the first connection in the pods to the final vows at the altar, the iconic goblet has been a constant companion on the journey to love in Love is Blind. Now, you can carry that symbol of connection and commitment with you wherever you go with the Love is Blind "Pod Squad" Gold-Plated Goblet Pendant. 

Whether you've been following every emotional twist or simply believe that love truly is blind, this pendant captures the spirit of trust and hope that defines the Love is Blind experience.

  • This product is: metal 3D printed Hallmarked 925 Sterling silver made of 100% recycled Silver. Comes with an adjustable anchor chain 17.7" to 19.7" (450mm-500mm). It is  planet-friendly, hypoallergenic, and skin-friendly (nickel free).
  • Should be kept dry at all times, avoid wearing while swimming, sleeping, bathing or sweating. If the jewelry is in contact with sea water, rinse with freshwater and dry immediately. Avoid exposure to high temperatures and direct contact with solvents, perfume or cosmetics.
